name: Annie Bourke
what_you_do: Annie provides animal communication services, including communicating with living animals and animals in spirit, as well as distance healing support using Reiki, crystals, and essential oils.
who_you_serve: Annie serves animal owners and people who want to communicate with family members or friends in spirit.
social_proof: Annie's first book 'The Bridge to Animal Consciousness' achieved international bestseller status at launch.
signature_programs: Animal Communication, Distance Healing, Animal Healing, Animal Communication Mentorship Program, Conscious Animal Parent Program
business_focus: Annie's mission is to raise global awareness of the importance of animals and provide services to help people communicate with their animals.
service_provided: animal communication, mediumship, distance healing, aromatherapy
